Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: J. G. Samuels
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone for a friend and he is very satisfied with it...he is now trying the sync the phone to his pc but is having issues locating the proper drivers for the cradle, other than that it works fine and he is satisfied.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Audiovox PPC 6600 is for CDMA network.
Hides a full 39 key QWERTY keyboard behind a 3.5-inch screen.
Bluetooth, ample memory (128MB of RAM), an SDIO/MMC card slot, and a speakerphone.
Organizer, as well as e-mail applications that operate on Windows Mobile 2003 Second Edition and a 400MHz Intel PXA263 processor.
Audiovox PPC 6600 can operate on EV-DO network.
ProductInfo.Name: Audiovox 6600 Pocket PC Bluetooth Camera CDMA Phone
